file_content.text: Declaration: Self-diagnostics complete. Assassination protocols active. All systems go.
Salutation: Greetings, master. I am HK-51. I am armed, operational and at your command.
You belong to me now, droid.
I am your master.
Acknowledgment: I had assumed so, master. You are the only organic here who is not frozen.
Summation: I can liquidate any undesirable organic with extreme prejudice. You have only to ask, master.
Dismissal: We have identical chassis, but that is where the similarities end, master. The HK-47 was flawed and volatile.
The HK-51 series is a far more efficient model. You will not find a more lethal or reliable assassin.
Admission: I am optimized for combat. I hope you are not an organic who favors negotiation.
I think I missed that part of Sith training.
Do I look like one?
Approval: I have always favored an Imperial education, master. Pacifism is inefficient.
I prefer the art of manipulation, but when that fails, I'm open to alternatives.
I dabble, sometimes.
Encouragement: I can provide many alternatives, master. Extreme brutality is my specialty.
People do what I say or they die.
Only if it involves a blaster.
Assertion: I am pleased to hear that, master. My intimidation protocols are always at your disposal.
I favor direct methods when dealing with problems.
Not really.
Offer: If you prefer to shoot first and ask questions later, master, I am always happy to assist.
The word you're looking for is "master."
Don't call me an "organic."
Retraction: My mistake, master. I forget not all organics appreciate such terminology.
I'll do as I see fit. Complain, and you're scrap.
You'll listen anyway.
Reassurance: I do not object to conversation, master. I simply prefer the one-sided variety.
Information: I will locate your starship and familiarize myself with your crew. If I detect any hint of mutiny, I will notify you immediately.
[This HK unit has been deactivated for quite some time. It will not respond to commands.]
Are you any relation to the assassin droid HK-47?
You look familiar.
I hope you can do more for me than just talk.
List your functions. droid.
Chief Engineer Vool'attar, reporting for duty. Thank you for securing the vessel, my lord. I'll take those parts and commence work immediately.
I am Chief Engineer Vool'attar. General Avrun sent me. Thank you for securing the vessel. I'll take those parts and get to work immediately.
Ahh!
